Description:

In Caleb Carr's fascinating tale of the kingdom of Broken, legend meets history, science defies all expectation, and one noble soldier struggles to save a fortress city besieged by enemies within and without.

NTY review, 2013 [ouch]:

This is a fantasy epic â€” the tale of a fabled Germanic kingdom that rose and fell during the Dark Ages â€” but with its convoluted prose, its trudging plot and its onslaught of unsurprising period detail, itâ€™s a perverted one. Sweat drips from the pages. Magic does not rise
